title: Lian Li Uni Fan P28 120mm Case Fan (3 Pack)
cat_seo_title: Lian Li Casing Fan Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy Lian Li Casing Fan at a competitive price in Bangladesh. Latest Lian Li Casing Cooler Fan available at Star Tech Shop. Order online to get delivery anywhere in BD.
full_description:
Lian Li Uni Fan P28 120mm Case Fan (3 Pack)

The Lian Li UNI FAN P28 is designed with both style and efficiency in mind, with brushed metal strips on the side that reflect the LEDs in your PC, producing a striking visual effect. The UNI FAN P28 has an interlocking mechanism that allows up to six fans in two clusters to be connected to a single fan speed controller, making fan installation and cable management a breeze. The UNI FAN P28 is a high-performance fan that is optimized for cooling. It includes a 28-mm-thick frame to help with ventilation and static pressure. For ease of installation, the fan has recessed screw holes that are compatible with 25mm fan screws. The liquid-crystal polymer (LCP) fan blade on the UNI FAN P28 is comprised of a robust substance that decreases vibration and allows the fan to run at high speeds without compromising stability. LCP also provides for a tight design structure between the fan blades and fan frame, increasing the surface area of the impeller and lowering the acoustic level when operating. To provide great performance while minimizing noise, the Lian Li UNI FAN uses a metal bearing shell and copper shielding to reduce friction and vibration between the impeller and the frame. For added convenience, the UNI FAN P28 includes a revolutionary magnetic fan speed controller that can be simply attached to any metal surface inside the PC case. The Uni Fan can use the optional side ARGB strips to replace the aluminum strips for a more sophisticated look with configurable lighting effects.

Buy Lian Li Uni Fan P28 120mm Case Fan (3 Pack) From Star Tech

In Bangladesh, you can get original Lian Li Uni Fan P28 120mm Case Fan (3 Pack) From Star Tech. We have a large collection of latest Lian Li Case Fan to purchase for your Casing. Order Online Or Visit your Nearest Star Tech Shop to get yours at lowest price. The Lian Li Uni Fan P28 120mm Case Fan (3 Pack) comes with 5 year warranty.

title: Lian Li UNI FAN SL120 120mm RGB Black Cooling Fan (3 Fan Pack)
cat_seo_title: Lian Li Casing Fan Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy Lian Li Casing Fan at a competitive price in Bangladesh. Latest Lian Li Casing Cooler Fan available at Star Tech Shop. Order online to get delivery anywhere in BD.
full_description:
Lian Li UNI FAN SL120 120mm RGB Black Cooling Fan (3 Fan Pack)

Lian Li UNI FAN SL120 120mm RGB Black Cooling Fan's Revolutionary fan comes with modular design, It's interlocking fan that can be linked up and operate with a fan and RGB cable. The included UNI HUB contains 4 designated UNI FAN ports. In this bcooling fan, Each port can connects to a cluster of 4 UNI FANs via the cable module, allowing users to control up to 16 UNI FANs in one go. The new Lian Li UNI FAN SL120 120mm RGB Black Cooling Fan come with 124 X 122.5 X 25 ( mm ) fan, DC 12V(FAN) & 5V(LED) rated voltage, 800~1900RPM fan speed, 2.54mmH2O max. air pressure, 58.54CFM max. air flow, 31dB(A) Max acoustical noise, >= 50mA locked current, Fluid Dynamic Bearing(FDB), DC 6.0V start up voltage, 180mA(FAN) /600mA (LED) input current and 5.16Watt input power. The L-Connect software enables users to control and adjust fan RPM, colors, brightness and lighting effects with extreme ease. moreover, pass control to the motherboard. In this cooling fan, each UNI Fan featured a cable module with a PIN to PIN contact point to receive the signal and power. This brand new Lian Li UNI FAN SL120 120mm RGB Black Cooling Fan has 01 year warranty.

LEDs on both sides, Multiple lighting effects
cat_seo_title: Lian Li Casing Fan Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech

product_page_short_description: Assembly with interlocking & daisy chain functionality
LEDs on both sides, Multiple lighting effects
full_description:
Lian Li UNI FAN AL AL120-3B Revolutionized Daisy-Chain ARGB Case Fan Black

Lian Li UNI FAN AL is one kind of Revolutionized Daisy-Chain ARGB Fan. This Case Fan is Simple assembly with interlocking and daisy chain functionality, Only two cables required for a cluster of fans and its aesthetic look with aluminum medallion and LEDs on both sides. The ARGB LEDs in this case fan are located at the inner fan blade and the four corner edges of the fan frame. Simply daisy chain the fans together with the slide-in interlocking system to pass the signals through the pin-to-pad contact. Users can choose to go with a single fan or link up to 4 fans, and operate each group with just 2 cables. The AL120 has better performance in air flow(64.5 CFM), noise levels(17 ~ 28.3 dB) and static pressure(2.62 mmH2O). The Lian Li UNI FAN AL has Customized LEDs on fan blades and the inner edge of the fan frame, Multiple lighting effects/fan speed control via L-connect software. This Improved static pressure and airflow while remaining silent. You can set both the fan blade lighting effects and the fan frame inner edge lighting effects separately, or go with the built-in combined lighting effects. The Latest Lian Li UNI FAN AL ARGB Case Fan comes with 02 years warranty.

Lian Li SC-T31B 33.8mm Push-Pull Radiator/Fan Combo Long Mounting Screw Set

The Lian Li SC-T31B Long 33.8mm Mounting Screw Set is suitable for customizing cooling systems. This set of mounting screws is specifically created for enthusiasts and builders looking for precision and dependability, and it is engineered to improve your PC's cooling performance effortlessly. These screws, handcrafted with painstaking attention to detail, are compatible with 28mm thick fans, ensuring a solid and robust attachment for your cooling components. The Lian Li SC-T31B Screw Set comes with 12 high-quality metal screws that are 33.8mm in length and have a thread size of 6#32. This optimal size combination offers a secure fit, eliminating vibrations and promoting a quieter and more efficient cooling experience. The Lian Li SC-T31B screws are made of superior metal and are designed to endure the rigors of PC cooling. The sturdy material gives your construction a sophisticated touch while also guaranteeing durability. The simplicity of installation and dependability of these screws make them an essential component for any cooling solution, regardless of experience level or inexperience with building computers. You can confidently upgrade your PC's thermal management because the Lian Li SC-T31B Long 33.8mm Mounting Screw Set offers the accuracy and dependability required to securely fasten your fans. Raise the bar for your cooling system and construct knowing that your hardware is backed by premium parts made to last.

Lian Li ST120 High Static Pressure Case Fan - 3 Pack Black

The Lian Li ST120 PWM fan from Galahad AIO is now separately available. Experience extreme cooling with satisfying light effects controlled by one click via the controller or motherboard software. It operates between 800 and 1900 RPM, and delivers a maximum airflow of 69.17 CFM and air pressure of 2.6 mmH20, making them ideal fans for any AIOs capable of hosting 120mm fans. Integrated with the fluid dynamic bearing, and extra magnetic support, the fan runs in silence and low vibrant. Equipped with ARGB LEDs that can be synchronized with the motherboard lighting software or managed via the included controller. It has a 1-year warranty.
